oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of the Asa Stone Lee family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The photograph includes Asa Stone Lee, Nancy Jacobs Lee, Thomas Jefferson Lee, Mary Jane Lee Nesbit, Robert Lee, John Jacobs Lee, and several others. Most of the men served in the Civil War. Robert Lee was killed and Asa was wounded in the war. The image is likely an albumen print, probably by a Rutherford County photographer.
